arts.ttl: “Embarrassment to the club” | West Ham scrape draw against the worst team in Premier League history
arts.sum: West Ham scrape an embarrassing point against the worst team in Premier League history. Watching West Ham this season is becoming a real chore. Boring football with a general lack of effort and next to no cohesion is absolutely infuriating to witness on a weekly basis. In perhaps their most frustrating game of the season,... The post “Embarrassment to the club” | West Ham scrape draw against the worst team in Premier League history appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Leicester City vs. Liverpool: Arne Slot must avoid West Ham United mistake, take step closer to Premier League title win
arts.sum: Liverpool will take on Leicester City in the Premier League on Sunday and Arne Slot must ensure his side do not repeat their display against West Ham United last Sunday.

arts.ttl: West Ham star slams team-mates in X-rated post-match interview: 'I'm very angry'
arts.sum: West Ham slumped to a 1-1 draw after conceding in the 93rd minute to already-relegated Southampton, a result and performance that left striker Niclas Fullkrug fuming

arts.ttl: Ugochukwu rescues a point for Southampton against West Ham
arts.sum: A stoppage-time goal from Lesley Ugochukwu earned Southampton a deserved 1-1 draw at West Ham United after a spirited performance. Southampton remain bottom of the table on 11 points, while West Ham - on a six-match winless streak - move up to 16th place, one point above Wolves having played a game more.

arts.ttl: Graham Potter responds to angry West Ham fans as Hammers star slams team-mates
arts.sum: West Ham have continued to stutter since Graham Potter replaced Julen Lopetegui at the London Stadium with Hammers fans appearing to turn on their boss during Saturday’s dismal draw against Southampton

arts.ttl: Jason Cundy moots West Ham star exit, O'Hara says 'like Harry Kane'
arts.sum: Graham Potter will be looking ahead to the summer transfer window, knowing that there is plenty of work to be done at West Ham. The... The post Jason Cundy moots West Ham star exit, O'Hara says 'like Harry Kane' appeared first on West Ham Zone.

arts.ttl: West Ham 1-1 Southampton: What Simon Rusk said
arts.sum: Southampton interim boss Simon Rusk, speaking to BBC Match of the Day: "Really pleased for the fans. Really pleased for the players as well, I think they deserved their moment at the end today.

arts.ttl: West Ham striker Niclas Fullkrug SLAMS team's performance in draw with Southampton: 'We were s***'
arts.sum: West Ham striker Niclas Fullkrug criticised his team-mates following their 1-1 draw with already relegated Southampton at home and says his side’s performance left him “very angry”.

arts.ttl: Graham Potter not a happy Hammer as he ponders big decisions
arts.sum: The West Ham boss was disappointed his team failed to control the game at home to already-relegated Southampton

arts.ttl: Insistence player will consider Fulham and West Ham transfers – Club hoping to ‘sell him back’ to Premier League
arts.sum: Fulham and West Ham United are among the ‘interested parties’ in Bayern Munich midfielder Joao Palhinha, who may end up valuing a return to the Premier League this summer.
